Um jogo além de seu tempo, popularmente conhecimento como TFC, Team Fortress é um jogo de FPS da Valve, porém não é tão famoso como Counter-Strike por exemplo. O jogo mais recente da franquia é o Team Fortress 2, e mesmo sendo o "vovô dos FPS" muitas pessoas ainda lotam as salas oficiais e servidores da comunidade, ao contrário do TFC.
If you bought this it was probably on accident.

While I respect  Team Fortress classic we can really see the improvement that Team Fortress 2 brings to the Team Fortress formula,  the characters are more funny and distinct, the artstyle is different and more captivating , the controls are better, the gameplay is more fine tuned,  the weapons are more balanced( most of them anyways), etc. this is just a relic that should be respected and remembered but not experienced. Would I recommend it? No, play TF2 instead. Have fun :3.

This game isn't anything special. There, I said it. It's dated by today's standards, and feels more like a game you only would have appreciated if you'd owned it since its inception back in the 90s. The primary reasons I do not recommend this game is - 
A) Team Fortress 2 is 200x better.
B) The lobbies are derelicts haunted by the souls of bots damned to a torterous eternity of playing this dreaded game and shouting "Heeugh!"
C) There are countless clones of this game.
Goldsource mods inspired by Half-Life weren't rare in the late 90s/early 00s, but that doesn't make them any good. Team Fortress Classic is a few degrees away from being almost identical to the gameplay of Day Of Defeat, Half-Life multiplayer, Counter-Strike and so on. 
So, yeah, let this game gather dust. If it's nostalgia you're after, you'll find it in the still surprisingly thriving Half-Life lobbies.

Зашел на сервак с самым минимальным пингом с игроками (250). Думал пострелять чисто на реакцию, показать детям как играть правильно , а на деле это оказался сервак на прыжки, в итоге после каждого прыжка меня дергало и я вышел. Неплохая игра за 133 рубля 99 года.

Here is my review of Team Fortress Classic. I will be listing both upsides and downsides.

Upsides:
*Several different maps to play on
*Nine different classes to help support your playstyle
*Almost every class has a unique secondary grenade
*Several players are still playing the game

Downsides:
*No bots included with the game, which makes the game harder to learn for new players
*Some classes are unbalanced, such as Soldier or Spy
*Due to every class having grenades, grenade spamming exists

So... TFC... 
It's a classic. (literally)
But the signs of age just get more and more obvious with every second I spent playing it.
I only semi-recommend it since it was part the foundation of what would become Team Fortress 2.

If you want to see what Team Fortress was before the 1960s inspired Artstyle. Go ahead.
But gameplay wise it can be pretty bland.

Team Fortress Classic is, well, a classic. I remember playing this for a bit back around the time it came out with some friends. There is actually still a small, hardcore community that plays the game, and it still definitely delivers enjoyment and some fast-paced action.

While I don't think that this game is bad at all, and it is great to see that there is still a community for it, I think that there are just better team-based FPS games out now, including the free-to-play Team Fortress 2. This may not be bad to try out if you get it in a bundle or as a gift, but, unless you really want to play it for nostalgia's sake, you can be satisfied with skipping this and playing one of the more modern shooters with larger communities.

Dejare algunas cosas sobres los personajes pd con muchas referencia al tf2

Clases:
Scout: Mas dificl que la mierda de manerjarlo no es el scout del tf2, Yaque tiene 75 de vida 
Pyro: en el tf2 era facil bueno, en este juego no es igual 
Soldier:es como el del tf2 facil 
Demon: este es como uno de lo faciles por su armas, la sticky bomb no son como la de tf2 se mueven hasta alguna distancia
Heavy:  igual como el tf2
Spy: todo igual como tf2, pero este Spy no se puede volver imbisibles
Medic: Para curar tenes que estar cerca de lo jugadores
Engy: lo mismo del tf2
Sniper: Si odias el clasico del tf2, bueno lo tendras que usar siempre la metralleta es el clasico, 

CONCLUSION
1: Si eres fanatico del tf2 y quieres ver su origenes te lo recomiendo
2:si te gustas los viejos juegos de valve te lo recomiendo
3:si nunca jugaste el tf2 no te lo recomiendo
